items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript-based template engine and static site generator. Features include partial support, dynamic routing, and easy integration of custom components like links and headers

items.content_html: Glin-Profanity is a lightweight and efficient npm package designed to detect and filter profane language in text inputs across multiple languages. Whether you’re building a chat application, a comment section, or any platform where user-generated content is involved, Glin-Profanity helps you maintain a clean and respectful environment.
items.title: GLINCKER/glin-profanity: Glin-Profanity is a lightweight and efficient npm package designed to detect and filter profane language in text inputs across multiple languages. Whether you’re building a chat application, a comment section, or any platform where user-generated content is involved, Glin-Profanity helps you maintain a clean and respectful environment.

items.content_html: VEE (Value Evaluation Expression) is a lightweight and flexible expression evaluation engine designed for JSON-based data structures. With VEE, you can define custom expressions that evaluate results by feeding in JSON values, making it easy to implement dynamic logic, filtering, and data transformation within your applications.
items.title: ark7-technology/vee: VEE (Value Evaluation Expression) is a lightweight and flexible expression evaluation engine designed for JSON-based data structures. With VEE, you can define custom expressions that evaluate results by feeding in JSON values, making it easy to implement dynamic logic, filtering, and data transformation within your applications.
